titleStmt.title: Il pastor fido: or The faithfull shepheard. Translated out of Italian into English
Pastor fido. English
titleStmt.author: Guarini, Battista, 1538-1612.
Dymock, John, attributed name.
Dymock, Charles, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Thomas Creede] for Simon VVaterson,

notesStmt.note: The translator is identified on [A]1v as a kinsman of Sir Edward Dymock, i.e. John Dymock? Charles Dymock?.
Running title reads: The faithfull shepheard.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
